commands.go: Use this command to get around the world. The syntax is: go [insert exit here]
commands.exits: Use this command to list all visible exits. No arguments needed.
commands.load: Use this command in the main menu to load a specific character. They syntax is: load: [insert character name here]
commands.new: Use this command to create a new world. The syntax is: new [world name] [save name]
